blocks.text: North London derby ‚Äî Arsenal visit Spurs with the title on the line
Haaland assisted as City beat Newcastle yesterday, closing to two points behind Arsenal. Three points away at Spurs keeps the Gunners in control ‚Äî drop them and it's a title race.
